people.title: Singer
people.name: Elvis Presley
people.bio: Elvis Aaron Presley was an American singer and actor. Regarded as one of the most significant cultural icons of the 20th century, he is often referred to as the 'King of Rock and Roll', or simply 'the King'.

people.title: President of the United States
people.name: Barack Obama
people.bio: Barack Hussein Obama II is an American politician who served as the 44th President of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He is the first African American to have served as president, as well as the first born outside the contiguous United States.

people.title: All Around Wonder Woman
people.name: Oprah Winfrey
people.bio: Oprah Gail Winfrey is an American media proprietor, talk show host, actress, producer, and philanthropist.
